Blog.post: *mimicks*..."I wanted to see if I still had feelings for you and...I don't" that is one of the greatest thing I've ever heard in my life...and if u knew the story behind it u wud think so too! hilarious really

wow...it's been three months exactly today since we've been broken up and u think I would be over u...but i'm not... I was a bit colser to getting over u, but as soon as I think I many lose u more than I already have...especially to my best friend - the one I'm most jealous of cuz she had the best of u...my feelings for u begin to show their true colors and the tears begin to fall harder than before, hurting me more than they ever have I know u don't feel the same about me and u probably never will so why won't these feelings for u disappear?? I want them to leave me more than ever so I can finally go on with my life...so I can finally be happy w/out u or any guy making me feel that way...cuz it seems I'm only happy if I'm with the guy I may be in love with...and I don't want that b/c it hurts so much afterwards... so why couldn't u just take her bak? why did u have to appeal to my heart? why did u have to feel the same about me as I did u? why did u have to be so great to me? cuz if none of this happened I'd be able live my life w/out shedding a tear in my heart whenever I think of you... omg...i'm just like you...which hurts more b/c it show that we could've been perfect for eachother....so let me ask u one more thing.... why couldn't u love me like u loved her?

you had know idea how good u had it...and now u do...but ur jepordizing everything over this....how cud u throw it away like that and expect to get it bak? I would've given anything to have wut u had w/him and u juss...killed wut u guys had...and now b/c of that I'm hurt more than ever b/c I was stupid enough to pick up ur scraps...I was stupid enough to believe I could've had wut u had, but no...u ruined any chances of that ever happening cuz u ruined him you have no idea wut ur irresponsible actions do to others around u b/c ur hurting them more than u think...ur hurting me more than u think...and u said u wud never do that to me cuz I was ur best friend but I guess ur word doesn't count for anything b/c I'm through holding it to ur last breath...I'm through thinking you'll keep ur promises...I'm through hoping u'll change cuz it's not going to happen...u'll never change cuz this is how u've always been and this is how u'll remain... it's clear to me now that I've put too much into this and I've wasted all my time caring about it this much cuz none of it is working; I'm not helping u in any way. My words are worthless to ur actions...so now everything u do is worthless to me b/c I'm sick of trying to help u...I'm sick of hoping u'll listen cuz my words don't even get thru to u...just continue screwing up your life more than it already is...I mean u've done a good enough job without anybody's help already haven't u? do u have any idea wut u've done now?

wow, I actually had a life today...went to renitas for a bit of non-boredomness...and actually had fun cuz there wasn't a flock of babies attacking us....it was great tho...we talked about him , had a laugh, and giggles like a couple of crazy loons (ie. a lot) but I have to say it was a good day cuz we had tons of fun and I finally saw EUROTRIP! That movie is hilarious in a non-sick-American Wedding way...except for the twins making out...altough there weren't really sister and bro, it's juss the idea of it...*cringe-twitch-twitch* oh and I also got some time to spend with...erm...my crush, if that's wut u call it...but yea, it was a marvy time and i may soon enough be in looove heaven *wink* and I have to say he reminds me sooooo much of Cooper from Eurotrip...haha...except not as stupid....hahahahahahahaha....I'll juss laugh to myself about that movie cuz it was hilarious and continue laughing about how much cooper reminds me of him....*laughs hysterically for a long annoying time* ok done....But u know wut I think wud be great is being a roomate with that hot of a guy...*sigh*...scott but let me ask u this...WHICH IS WORSE:being chased by scary fat naked men, watching their junk flap around or being behind all the men seeing their bum-oleys shake about?
hmmmm...i just found myself whimpering in my sleep...what a crazy-arse dream...
I must be bored if I'm observing my basooma go nunga-nunga-nunga ....again I am not sick!
I am not sick...just bored

*hmmm...* I started re-reading the book -Knocked out ny my nunga-nungas-, which is...A LAUGH, and I read the definition of the term nunga-nungas...which is a girl's breasty business if you couldn't figure it out...but anyhow...it says that they can be called that b/c if u get hold of a girl's breast and pull it up and then let go-- it goes nunga-nunga-nunga ....and to my observation...it does!

sacré bleu ...I"m not for certain but I may like some one....someone I thought i would never like again...cuz we went out and I dumped him...well i didn't really dump him, my friends sort of did cuz they're bum-oleys...but u know...but still I'm pretty sure I said to myself a million times... ewww, i'd never be attracted to him again... ...but now I am??? I mean I find myself calling him everyday, hoping he's online when I log on and going to his house for an unexpected visit...juss anyway to get some sort of contact with him??...hmmm...who knows *shrugs shoulders* maybe I juss need a snog...
is that all i think about now???.... my hormones need to be tamed !...*peculiar face*

*mmmm...* I love the smell of a thunder storm during the day...I love the warmth from a thunder storm...I love the rain from a thunder storm....I love everything form a thunder storm...now it would be better if I were to go outside with a really hot guy and have a mega fab thunder storm snog ...*malicious smile*

i have come to find that my lips have definetly got snogging withdrawl...I juss always imagine snogging some really hott bloke...preferably the number one hottie in the world...orli..*sigh*....I would juss ravish him!...but I don't think that would work cuz... a) i have no chance with him and b) I'm pretty sure I've lost all posssible good snogging techniques I've developed over the...erm....almost a year....

plz...if he's not there don't have anybody answer...plz oh plz... hmmmm... him was sleeping...shoulda figured...so technically I didn't break my record right? cuz i didn't talk to him!...*confused smile*

I found myself staring at the phone thinking about calling him must...resist...temptation! The little vouice in my head kept saying, "C'mon, pick up the phone and call him !" But I have sustained from giving into his lil mind games and have forbidden myself to call him ever again. I mean why break my record of not talking to him now? i will not break my one week record...I will not break my one week record...*continues chanting*

I made a vow to myself to lose my belly fat this summer so I can prepared for the new school year...where I may be officially labeled a hott sex bombe *wink wink*....But I think the only person that may call me that is...erm....kelly which is a) intriguing and b) scary. but anywho, I made a vow to myself and it worked...for like two days, but my goal keeps getting sidetracked by chocolate, ice cream, and...burritos!...oh and gotta add hanging out with friends and sleeping on that list, which does not help any.....so now I have to keep this promise to myself that I will lose my sto... oooo chips *big smile*

it took me FOREVER to figure out how to put things in the sidebar....it's been a while since multimedia so i kinda forgot...erm...EVERYTHING...but i updated it so now everything's fine... this totally suks that i can like...never be on the comp....i have to sneak on which makes it worse cuz who knows...i might get caught and then they'll find out my secret on how i get on here....hey! that proves that I'm....SNEAKY!...*muahahahaha* i got u KIRSTIN!....ok well i'm gonna go cuz i've been on the comp wayyyyy to long...until tomorrow.... signing out...

they've really spiced up this blog thing now haven't they?...i don't have to update any of it in my template MYSELF!...oh the rapture! oh the joy! yep so this is fun....wow, i'm pretty pathetic thinking this is fun....hmm...all they need now is emoticons...THAT WOULD ROCK!
dude...it's so boring here. I need a life.

*hmmmm...* I am trés pathetico cuz so-far everyday of my summer life I have complained that I do not have a life... I MUST STOP especially since I am boring any possible readers out there to tears....which just leaves me where i started...hmmm.... ok, from now I declare that I will not complain about my non-life as long as I don't have a life!
wow, another day of no phone calls from any , i repeat any of my friends.... did they forget to remember that I'm not dead yet??? *sigh*...this is my life....
why aren't I dead yet????? just put me out of my misery....
sacré bloody bleu , i am still surviving in this world w/out a life....I should be dying of boredom right about......now

holy hell...it's been forever since i've written in a blog...and now it is a tid bit different because...I HAVE NO AUDIENCE...this is my life....ehe....yea, well my other blog is now permanently left in the time of sepetember where life was the same except i was going to a hellish place called high school....hmmm, wut are the odds?....yea well now i have a comp to go on so i can write in my blog juss to update everybody on my life.... ::MY UPDATE ON MY LIFE:: it has been at least three-four weeks since school has been out and i have done...*drum roll*... NOTHING! ....my life is more boring than ever filled with more disappointments becuz all my friends have left me....*sobs hysterically*....woe is me who has no friends!...oh well might as well get used to it considering this is how my first month of summer is going to be...KELLY U BUM GET BAK HERE!!! signing out...

*takes a deep breath...*...badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers mushroom mushroom, uhh- badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers mushroom mushroom, uhh-badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers mushroom mushroom, uhh-badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers badgers mushroom mushroom, ARRRGHHH!...a snake! a snake! a snake, a wretched snake!.... ok u know how ANNOYING THAT IS!!!????.....i am never going there again....IT WENT ON FOREVER!!!.....when will the BADGERS GO AWAY!!!......*cries hysterically...* i am most likely going to have badger nightmares for the rest of my life...AHHHH!!!....breakdown....
i'm really bored NOW....it's suks here!

I actually have a life! I mean this whole week I've been TOTALLY busy!!!! I'm pretty sure I've done something fun everyday! WHOO HOO!! great stuff huh? cuz that means I will never compain about my life anymore *thumbs up*

wow...was that cold or what? i could've died, but I didn't just to spite everyone...*muahahahahahahaha* great stuff huh? but it was really fun with my buddies...despite the cold...we splashed, we laughed, we talked, we cried...ok not cried...but i thought i shud add some drama...but Kirstin and I defeintely laughed..LOL...i'm still laughing about it now..whoo! *rolls on ground laughing* *laughs so hard that I pee in pants* *sits there bewildered in own piss...* ok it wasn't that funny but it wud've excited kelly for a minutes...ha!
Ryan Fish is REALLY hott and that's definetly a guy i'm gonna talk to this summer *wink*

soccer was soooooo unorganized today...all we did was run around kicking eachother for a few minutes...oh wait that is soccer...duh! ok no....but it wud be better that way.... but our head coach left us to so he cud go coach the younger league....so we were left w/KIRSTIN as co-captian....ahhhh!!!....scary huh? so we did the same drill for 15 minutes, then we scrimmaged which was fun so all-in-all it was great.... now i'm gonna go on with my ACTIVE LIFE w/a swim in the ocean..funness already

i actually got TONS of phone call today! well not tons but it's defiently a record for the summer....I got 4 calls today!....can u believe it? four!...that breaks my record of one per week...AND before it was always the same person, but this time it was FOUR different pple cuz...i finally have more friends amazing huh?...especially for me *wink* I FINALLY HAVE A LIFE! *happy dance* *trips into a puddle of drool*...damn!

hey guess wut??? KIRSTIN GETS BAK TOMORROW!!!! FINALLY! i've been waiting for this for like ever.........yea, so she's coming bak tomorrow and then we'll have some fun like the good old days! yea, so it will be cool....*big smile* i'll be counting the hours...juss b/c i'm really bored
